creator: mheidel@euc.de
text:
Basic Auth works fine in any of our virtual hosts when SSL is disabled.

If I copy the proper authentication configuration block of httpsd.conf to an
virtual server in which SSl is enabled, Basic Auth would not work. Server error
log shows:
... [error] [client ...] user  not found: /admin

Of course I entered a valid username in my browser's login dialog.

Our Configuration: OpenBSD 3.6, apache_1.3.33+ssl_1.55, mod_perl 1.29, php 4.3.10

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Please try a user support forum for configuration issues:
http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users
